Klasse DTOConverter

java.lang.Object
mapper.DTOConverter
public class DTOConverter extends Object
Utility class for converting domain objects to Data Transfer Objects (DTOs). All conversion methods include null-safety checks and handle edge cases gracefully.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

  • Konstruktordetails

    • DTOConverter

      public DTOConverter()

  • Methodendetails

    • toDTO

      public static StichDTO toDTO(Stich stich)
      Converts a Stich (trick) domain object to a StichDTO.
      Parameter:
      stich - the Stich object to convert, may be null.
      Gibt zurück:
      StichDTO containing the trick data, never null.

    • toDTO

      public static PlayerDTO toDTO(Spieler spieler)
      Converts a Spieler (player) domain object to a PlayerDTO.
      Parameter:
      spieler - the spieler object to convert, may be null.
      Gibt zurück:
      PlayerDTO containing the player data, or null id input is null.

    • toDTO

      public static CardDTO toDTO(Karte karte)
      Converts a Karte (card) domain object to a CardDTO.
      Parameter:
      karte - the Karte object to convert, may be null
      Gibt zurück:
      CardDTO containing the card data, uses "null" as ID if input is null

    • toDTO

      public static GameStateDTO toDTO(Spiel game)
      Converts a Spiel (game) domain object to a GameStateDTO.
      Parameter:
      game - the Spiel object to convert, may be null
      Gibt zurück:
      GameStateDTO containing the complete game state, or null if input is null

    • toDTo

      public static LeaderboardEntryDTO toDTo(Account account)
      Converts an Account domain object to a LeaderboardEntryDTO.
      Parameter:
      account - the Account object to convert, should not be null
      Gibt zurück:
      LeaderboardEntryDTO containing username and win count
